tokens.text: stays at a level in liquid

description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid. This behavior was deprecated in 1.18.20 and replaced with minecraft:behavior.float.
note: This behavior was used by striders in versions 1.16-1.18.10 but has been replaced with minecraft:behavior.float in newer versions.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Rise To Liquid Level Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.

fields.title: Liquid y Offset
fields.description: Target distance down from the liquid surface. i.e. Positive values move the target Y down.

fields.title: Rise Delta
fields.description: Movement up in Y per tick when below the liquid surface.

fields.title: Sink Delta
fields.description: Movement down in Y per tick when above the liquid surface.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
